Usage

Config Utilities

Hail Utilities

hail_annotation.is_vcf(input_df)

Return True if input contains minimum VCF columns (CHROM, POS, REF, ALT)

hail_annotation.add_db_annotations(vcf, db, paths, cache_dir='/Users/bbowles/Documents/Code/refdata/tmp/')
hail_annotation.hail_annotate(input_df, exomepath='/Users/bbowles/Documents/Code/refdata/gnomad/exomes/gnomad.exomes.r2.1.sites.ht', genomepath='/Users/bbowles/Documents/Code/refdata/gnomad/genomes/gnomad.genomes.r2.1.sites.ht', transcriptpath='/Users/bbowles/Documents/Code/refdata/gnomad/proportion_expressed/all.baselevel.021620.ht', genomes=True, exomes=True, pex=True)

Input: Pandas dataframe containing minimum VCF cols

Output: Annotated dataframe containing epopmax, gpopmax, and proportion_expressed, keyed by variant. Allele frequency > 0.01 is returned as NA.
